name: id
label: id
description: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing. (NCIT:C25364 )

name: name
label: name
description: The words or language units by which a thing is known. (NCIT:C42614 )

name: description
label: description
description: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something. (NCIT:C25365 )

name: date
label: date
description: A date of database submission refers to the moment in time in which some information was submitted/received to a database system. (SIO:001083 )

name: createdby
label: createdBy
description: Indicates the person or authoritative body who brought the item into existence. (NCIT:C42628 )

name: numberofentriesadded
label: numberOfEntriesAdded
description: Combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope. (NCIT:C45330 )

name: datasource
label: dataSource
description: The person or authoritative body who provided the information. (NCIT:C16493 )

name: releasecomments
label: releaseComments
description: A notation regarding the decisions, and/or clarification of any information pertaining to data management. (NCIT:C115505 )
